content: Answer the following quesiton in a better way.Question: What problem(s) is being solved within the scope of the grant?\*Answer:We are creating an event for the Mexican people that can’t afford to go to other cities of the world to be part of an Ethereum event.We want to have an event where Mexican people learn that the web3 ecosystem is not only about crypto.This would be the first Ethereum México created and focused in a community-backed event.
